name: system:node
description: The System table reports general system activity. This includes global throughput for the main services, I/O latency, and CPU activity. The alias name for system:node is system_node.

counter_schemas.name: average_processor_busy_percent
counter_schemas.description: Average processor utilization across active processors in the system

counter_schemas.name: cifs_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of CIFS operations per second

counter_schemas.name: cpu_busy
counter_schemas.description: System CPU resource utilization. Returns a computed percentage for the default CPU field. Basically computes a 'cpu usage summary' value which indicates how 'busy' the system is based upon the most heavily utilized domain. The idea is to determine the amount of available CPU until we're limited by either a domain maxing out OR we exhaust all available idle CPU cycles, whichever occurs first.

counter_schemas.name: disk_data_read
counter_schemas.description: Number of disk kilobytes (KB) read per second

counter_schemas.name: disk_data_written
counter_schemas.description: Number of disk kilobytes (KB) written per second

counter_schemas.name: domain_busy
counter_schemas.description: Array of processor time in percentage spent in various domains

counter_schemas.name: domain_shared
counter_schemas.description: Array of processor time in percentage spent in various shared domains

counter_schemas.name: dswitchto_cnt
counter_schemas.description: Array of processor time in percentage spent in domain switch

counter_schemas.name: fcp_data_received
counter_schemas.description: Number of FCP kilobytes (KB) received per second

counter_schemas.name: fcp_data_sent
counter_schemas.description: Number of FCP kilobytes (KB) sent per second

counter_schemas.name: fcp_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of FCP operations per second

counter_schemas.name: hard_switches
counter_schemas.description: Number of context switches per second

counter_schemas.name: hdd_data_read
counter_schemas.description: Number of HDD Disk kilobytes (KB) read per second

counter_schemas.name: hdd_data_written
counter_schemas.description: Number of HDD kilobytes (KB) written per second

counter_schemas.name: interrupt_num_in_cp
counter_schemas.description: Number of processor interrupts in CP

counter_schemas.name: intr_cnt
counter_schemas.description: Array of interrupt count per second

counter_schemas.name: iscsi_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of iSCSI operations per second

counter_schemas.name: network_data_received
counter_schemas.description: Number of network kilobytes (KB) received per second

counter_schemas.name: network_data_sent
counter_schemas.description: Number of network kilobytes (KB) sent per second

counter_schemas.name: nfs_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of NFS operations per second

counter_schemas.name: num_processors
counter_schemas.description: Total number of processors in the system

counter_schemas.name: other_latency
counter_schemas.description: Average latency for all other operations in the system in microseconds

counter_schemas.name: partner_data_received
counter_schemas.description: SCSI Partner kilobytes (KB) received per second

counter_schemas.name: partner_data_sent
counter_schemas.description: SCSI Partner kilobytes (KB) sent per second

counter_schemas.name: read_latency
counter_schemas.description: Average latency for all read operations in the system in microseconds

counter_schemas.name: sk_switches
counter_schemas.description: Number of sk switches per second

counter_schemas.name: ssd_data_read
counter_schemas.description: Number of SSD Disk kilobytes (KB) read per second

counter_schemas.name: ssd_data_written
counter_schemas.description: Number of SSD Disk kilobytes (KB) written per second

counter_schemas.name: sys_read_data
counter_schemas.description: Network and FCP kilobytes (KB) received per second

counter_schemas.name: sys_total_data
counter_schemas.description: Network and FCP kilobytes (KB) received and sent per second

counter_schemas.name: sys_write_data
counter_schemas.description: Network and FCP kilobytes (KB) sent per second

counter_schemas.name: time
counter_schemas.description: Time in seconds since the Epoch (00:00:00 UTC January 1 1970)

counter_schemas.name: time_per_interrupt_in_cp
counter_schemas.description: Processor time per interrupt in CP

counter_schemas.name: total_latency
counter_schemas.description: Average latency for all operations in the system in microseconds

counter_schemas.name: total_ops
counter_schemas.description: Total number of operations per second

counter_schemas.name: total_processor_busy
counter_schemas.description: Total processor utilization of active processors in the system

counter_schemas.name: total_processor_busy_time
counter_schemas.description: Total processor time of active processors in the system

counter_schemas.name: uptime
counter_schemas.description: Time in seconds that the system has been up

counter_schemas.name: write_latency
counter_schemas.description: Average latency for all write operations in the system in microseconds
